description: This schema represents a ratio of numerical values with a unit of measure.

numerator_value.description: The lower boundary of the range.

denominator_value.description: The upper boundary of the range.

references.description: The unit of measure of the element. Allowed values are drawn from the Common synonyms (non-UCUM) column of [subset of] UCUM, SI and English units.
